EmailTemplate.subject: REPLYING TO A COMPLAINT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REPLYING TO A COMPLAINT Good day {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c} Thank you for raising the concern/complaint received from………………….on ………………. regarding the service you received from our …………………… Department. We sincerely apologise that you did not receive the service we strive to deliver. We know that the success of an organisation depends largely on its relationship with its customers. Be assured that the matter has been taken up with the relevant department and persons involved in order to ensure that similar incidents do not occur in future. To answer your enquiry we wish to inform you of the following procedure: [Insert here what is relevant to the matter] We trust the above clarifies the matter and would like to take this opportunity to thank you for bringing the abovementioned problem to our attention. Kind regards {!User.Name} | Service Consultant | Phone:{!User.CSC_Phone__c} Address: 1st Floor, Block B | Barclays Pretoria Campus | 270 Maggs Str | Waltloo | Pretoria
Please consider your environmental responsibility before printing this e-mail. COMPANY CONFIDENTIAL This mail and any attachments are confidential, privileged and for internal use within Absa Bank Limited/Barclays Africa Group Limited only, unless otherwise expressly provided. The contents may not be copied, disclosed and/or distributed to any other person and may only be used for the purpose of the matter to which it relates and the person to whom it is addressed.
